snippet: Barring a loss Tuesday against Guatemala, the United States men’s soccer team has a chance to automatically advance to the final round of World Cup qualifying in their region.
abstract: United States national soccer team will face Guatemala in the final day of World Cup qualifying semifinal group stage.
lead_paragraph: Barring a loss Tuesday against Guatemala, the United States men’s soccer team has a chance to automatically advance to the final round of World Cup qualifying in their region.

headline.seo: U.S. Would Advance With Win or Draw Against Guatemala
headline.main: With Win or Draw Against Guatemala, U.S. Would Advance
